content.p: Provision of hosting services for MySQL databases MySQL databases are typically used to provide content support for websites, but they can also be used as repositories for data capture and other data dependent computer applications. The MySQL Hosting Service is available to all University members of staff We can also accept requests from postgraduate students where there is a member of staff who will act as a nominated sponsor of their project Free at point of use Request a hosted MySQL Database via the self-service portal Database hosting request Once your request is successful the MySQL Admin Team, will provide you with details for connecting to and work with your database If you're struggling please get in touch with the team Submit and track requests to solve your IT issues Updates on the University's core IT services
